forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with a steady rain this morning. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing for the afternoon. High 14C. S winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing for the afternoon. High 56F. S winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms this evening will give way to steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms this evening will give way to steady rain overnight. Low 44F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady rain late. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady rain late. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High near 15C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 59F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 60F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
